summary: Adds 2 greatswords and a tower shield to the game.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds 2 greatswords and a shield to the game.  Take them adventuring or just hang them all up on the wall, whatever works for you.  The swords are 2-handed flamberge-types - one \"realistic\" and the other more a fantasy-blade type of thing - and the shield is a rugged, metal-banded wooden tower shield.

You can make all the items at any forge...the Zweihander and Tower Shield are under Steel and the Fellreaver is in Ebony.  Ingredients are as follows:

Zweihander
-2 orichalcum ingots, 4 leather Strips, 4 steel ingots

Fellreaver
-5 ebony ingots, 2 quicksilver ingots, 1 dragon bone

Tower Shield
-6 firewood, 2 leather strips, 4 iron ingots

INSTALLATION/UPDATING
The folder should be fully drag-and-droppable like any other mod

This mod\'s resources - mesh, textures, etc. are my work and I do not grant any permission to re-use or redistribute beyond the 
Nexus, especially for profit.
author: Morphologia
